trans-unit.source: Specifies a property or field to update or a method to run using the CodeDom types.
trans-unit.target: Specifica una proprietà o campo da aggiornare o un metodo da eseguire utilizzando i tipi CodeDom.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> classe utilizzando un <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> indicante l'azione da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> classe utilizzando un <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> indicante l'azione da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia completa dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> identica a questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the code statement specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'istruzione di codice che specifica l'azione da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> indicante l'azione da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di oggetto sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Da confrontare con l'attuale <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se gli oggetti sono uguali. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> context used to execute the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> utilizzata per eseguire il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i campi e le proprietà aggiornati da un <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> per gestire il processo di convalida.

trans-unit.source: A list of the fields and properties changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco dei campi e proprietà modificati da un <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string value of the action.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore di stringa dell'azione.

trans-unit.source: The string value of the action.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di stringa dell'azione.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Verifica che il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> sia configurato correttamente e non presenti errori.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> contains errors (the Validate method returns false), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>contiene errori (il metodo Validate restituisce false), quindi <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>conterrà l'elenco di errori rilevati.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> per gestire il processo di convalida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> had no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> è senza errori; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
